title: Hilton Eco-Wellness Retreat in India
description: Journey into India's enchanting UNESCO World Heritage-listed Western Ghats mountains for a tranquil eco wellness escape at the Hilton Shillim Estate Retreat & Spa. Located just a 2.5-hour drive from Mumbai, this spectacular all-villa property is surrounded by lush forests, mysterious lakes and miles of greenery perfect for trekking, biking, fishing, horse riding and more. Enjoy two nights in a King Valley Villa with daily breakfast, nightly three-course dinners, daily cocktails and a 30-minute spa treatment for two.
location_description: Hilton Shillim Estate Retreat & Spa- OLD
offer_address: Pawana Nagar, Taluka Maval, Shilimb, Maharashtra 410406, India
